articles.author: Maggie Harrison Dupré
articles.title: Derelict Helicopter Will Twitch on Mars, NASA Says - Futurism
articles.description: Ingenuity, NASA's recently-damaged Mars helicopter, has one last task before its mission is officially over: wiggling around a little.
articles.content:
"It's been the mission of a lifetime for all of us."
The Wiggles
Its mission might be over, but it's not dead just yet!
Last week, NASA tragically revealed that its beloved Mars helicopter, Ingenu… [+2460 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Palworld's Pokémon pastiche is Xbox Game Pass' biggest-ever 3rd-party game launch - Ars Technica
articles.description: To compare, Pokémon Scarlet and Violet have sold over 23 million copies each.
articles.content:
81
